description:
Retrives information of all the spaces available in user's Clickup Workspace. Example Call:
```python
get_spaces({'team_id': 'a1b2c3d4', 'archived': False})
```
name: get_spaces

archived.description: A flag to decide whether to include archived spaces or not

description:
Creates a new ClickUp space. Example Call:
```python
create_space ({
  'team_id': 'abc123',
  'name': 'NewWorkspace',
  'multiple_assignees': True,
  'features__due_dates__enabled': True,
  'features__due_dates__start_date': False,
  'features__due_dates__remap_due_dates': False,
  'features__due_dates__remap_closed_due_date': False,
  'features__time_tracking__enabled': True
})
```
name: create_space

features__due_dates__enabled.description: If due date feature is enabled within the space. Default: True

features__due_dates__remap_closed_due_da.description: If remapping closed date feature in due dates is available within the space. Default: False

features__due_dates__remap_due_dates.description: If remapping due date feature in due dates is available within the space. Default: False

features__due_dates__start_date.description: If start date feature in due dates is available within the space. Default: False

features__time_tracking__enabled.description: If time tracking feature is available within the space. Default: True

multiple_assignees.description: Enable or disable multiple assignees for tasks within the space

name.description: The name of the new space to create

description:
Retrives information of a specific Clickup space. Example Call:
```python
get_space({'space_id': 's12345'})
```
name: get_space

space_id.description: The ID of the space to retrieve details

description:
Modifies name, settings the Space color, and assignee management Space. Example Call:
```python
update_space({
  'space_id': 's12345',
  'name': 'UpdatedWorkspace',
  'color': '#f0f0f0',
  'private': True,
  'admin_can_manage': False,
  'multiple_assignees': True,
  'features__due_dates__enabled': True,
  'features__due_dates__start_date': False,
  'features__due_dates__remap_due_dates': False,
  'features__due_dates__remap_closed_due_date': False,
  'features__time_tracking__enabled': True
})
```
name: update_space

admin_can_manage.description: A flag to determine if the administrator can manage the space or not

color.description: The color used for the space

features__due_dates__enabled.description: If due date feature is enabled within the space. Default: True

features__due_dates__remap_closed_due_da.description: If remapping closed date feature in due dates is available within the space. Default: False

features__due_dates__remap_due_dates.description: If remapping due date feature in due dates is available within the space. Default: False

features__due_dates__start_date.description: If start date feature in due dates is available within the space. Default: False

features__time_tracking__enabled.description: If time tracking feature is available within the space. Default: True

multiple_assignees.description: Enable or disable multiple assignees for tasks within the space

name.description: The new name of the space

private.description: A flag to determine if the space is private or not

description:
Delete an existing space from user's ClickUp Workspace. Example Call:
```python
delete_space({'space_id': 's12345'})
```
name: delete_space

space_id.description: The ID of the space to delete

description:
Retrives all the Tags assigned on all the tasks in a Space. Example Call:
```python
get_space_tags({'space_id': 's12345'})
```
name: get_space_tags

space_id.description: The ID of the space to retrieve all the tags from

description:
Assigns a customized Tag in a ClickUp Space. Example Call:
```python
create_space_tag({
  'space_id': 's12345',
  'tag__name': 'Important',
  'tag__tag_bg': '#ff0000',
  'tag__tag_fg': '#ffffff'
})
```
name: create_space_tag

tag__name.description: The name of the tag to assign

tag__tag_bg.description: The background color of the tag to assign

tag__tag_fg.description: The foreground(text) color of the tag to assign

description:
Deletes a specific tag previously assigned in a space. Example Call:
```python
delete_space_tag({
  'space_id': 's12345',
  'tag_name': 'Important',
  'tag__name': 'Important',
  'tag__tag_bg': '#ff0000',
  'tag__tag_fg': '#ffffff'
})
```
name: delete_space_tag

tag__name.description: The name of the tag to delete

tag__tag_bg.description: The background color of the tag to delete

tag__tag_fg.description: The foreground color of the tag to delete

tag_name.description: The name of the tag to delete
